title: Effect of registration in beneficiary form
context: [ยง539-6] Effect of registration in beneficiary form. The designation of a transfer-on-death beneficiary on a registration in beneficiary form has no effect on ownership until the owner&rsquo;s death. A registration of a security in beneficiary form may be canceled or changed at any time by the sole owner or all then surviving owners without the consent of the beneficiary. [L 1998, c 63, pt of ยง1]
